summary: The Marantz MM-7025 Stereo Power Amplifier is currently listed for sale at $750.
This amplifier is in excellent condition and is confirmed to be in perfect working status.
It is compatible with AV Receivers and includes a Marantz trigger cable.
Inputs include both RCA and XLR options, enhancing its versatility for audio setups.
The item is being sold by a private party located in Watsonville, within the SF Bay Area and Santa Cruz, with local pickup only.

attributes.location: Watsonville, SF Bay Area, Santa Cruz
